mapper.sql:
ro.id, ro.org_id , ro.retailer_id, ro.outstock_date, ro.outstock_no,ro.img_url, ro.outstock_type, ro.outstock_type_name, ro.price_id, ro.pay_price, ro.num,
ro.presell_price,ro.presell_money,ro.sold_num,ro.sold_price,ro.sold_money, ro.paid_type, ro.paid_type_name,ro.check_status, ro.remark, ro.register_id, ro.register_name, ro.registe_date, ro.outstock_status, ro.audit_status, ro.audit_user, ro.audit_user_name, ro.audit_date, ro.audit_remark, ro.sale_total_money, ro.acce_id, ro.acce_name, ro.balance_name, ro.balance_date, ro.check_men,ro.check_men_name,ro.check_date,ro.trouble_type,ro.trouble_name,ro.check_remark, ro.enable, ro.create_user, ro.create_user_name, ro.create_date, ro.update_user, ro.update_user_name, ro.update_date,ro.version,ro.check_update_name,ro.check_update_date, s.spec_name,s.spec_company,m.goodsName,t.typeName,p.spec_id,m.goodsId,rt.retailer,rt.retailer_short

id, org_id, retailer_id, outstock_date, outstock_no, outstock_type, outstock_type_name, price_id, pay_price, num,
sale_total_money, acce_id, acce_name, balance_name, balance_date,img_url,
presell_price,presell_money,sold_num,sold_price,sold_money, paid_type, paid_type_name, check_status, remark, register_id, register_name, registe_date, outstock_status, audit_status, audit_user, audit_user_name, audit_date, audit_remark, check_men,check_men_name,check_date,trouble_type,trouble_name,check_remark, enable, create_user, create_user_name, create_date, update_user, update_user_name, update_date,version,check_update_name,check_update_date

sql.set:
ro.org_id =#{orgId},
ro.retailer_id=#{retailerId},
ro.outstock_date=#{outstockDate},
ro.outstock_no=#{outstockNo},
ro.outstock_type=#{outstockType},
ro.outstock_type_name=#{outstockTypeName},
ro.price_id=#{priceId},
ro.pay_price=#{payPrice},
ro.num=#{num},
ro.presell_price=#{presellPrice},
ro.presell_money=#{presellMoney},
ro.sold_num=#{soldNum},
ro.sold_price=#{soldPrice},
ro.sold_money=#{soldMoney},
ro.paid_type=#{paidType},
ro.paid_type_name=#{paidTypeName},
ro.check_status=#{checkStatus},
ro.remark=#{remark},
ro.register_id=#{registerId},
ro.register_name=#{registerName},
ro.registe_date=#{registeDate},
ro.outstock_status=#{outstockStatus},
ro.audit_status=#{auditStatus},
ro.audit_user=#{auditUser},
ro.audit_user_name=#{auditUserName},
ro.audit_date=#{auditDate},
ro.audit_remark=#{auditRemark},
ro.check_men=#{checkMen},
ro.check_men_name=#{checkMenName},
ro.check_date=#{checkDate},
ro.trouble_type=#{troubleType},
ro.trouble_name=#{troubleName},
ro.check_remark=#{checkRemark},
ro.enable=#{enable},
ro.create_user=#{createUser},
ro.create_user_name=#{createUserName},
ro.create_date=#{createDate},
ro.update_user=#{updateUser},
ro.update_user_name=#{updateUserName},
ro.sale_total_money=#{saleTotalMoney},
ro.acce_id=#{acceId},
ro.acce_name=#{acceName},
ro.balance_name=#{balanceName},
ro.balance_date=#{balanceDate},
ro.img_url=#{imgUrl},
ro.update_date=#{updateDate},
ro.check_update_name=#{checkUpdateName},
ro.check_update_date=#{checkUpdateDate},
ro.version = #{version}+1

mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(ro.id) FROM lar_recycle_outstock ro
1=1
AND ro.city = #{larPager.params.city}
AND createDate < NOW()
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM lar_recycle_outstock ro WHERE id=#{id}

DELETE FROM lar_recycle_outstock ro
ro.id IN
#{id}
false
mapper.update:
UPDATE lar_recycle_outstock ro SET ro.enable = 1
ro.id IN
#{id}
false

UPDATE lar_recycle_outstock ro
WHERE ro.id=#{id} AND ro.version=#{version} AND ro.enable =0
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM lar_recycle_outstock ro
ro.id IN
${id}
false

SELECT
FROM lar_recycle_outstock ro
1=1
AND ro.${item}=#{map[${item}]}

SELECT
FROM lar_recycle_outstock ro LEFT JOIN lar_recyclingprice p ON ro.price_id = p.id LEFT JOIN lar_recyclingspec s ON p.spec_id = s.id LEFT JOIN lar_recyclingmaterial m ON s.goods_id = m.goodsId LEFT JOIN lar_recyclingtype t ON t.id = s.type_id LEFT JOIN lar_recycle_retailer rt ON rt.id = ro.retailer_id
ro.id=#{id} AND ro.enable=0
AND ro.${item}=#{map[${item}]}
